text: Stephen Joseph Graham (born 3 August 1973) is an English actor. He is best known for playing Andrew "Combo" Gascoigne in the movie This Is England (2006) and its television sequels This Is England '86 (2010), This Is England '88 (2011) and This Is England '90 (2015). His other movie roles include Tommy in Snatch (2000), Shang in Gangs of New York (2002), Baby Face Nelson in Public Enemies (2009), Scrum in the Pirates of the Caribbean movies On Stranger Tides (2011) and Dead Men Tell No Tales (2017), and Anthony "Tony Pro" Provenzano in The Irishman (2019). On television, Graham has starred as Al Capone in the HBO series Boardwalk Empire (2010â€“2014), John Corbett in the BBC One series Line of Duty (2019) and as Jacob Marley in the BBC/FX miniseries A Christmas Carol (2019). Graham was born in Kirkby, Lancashire. He has Jamaican and Swedish ancestry. He is married to Hannah Walters. The couple have two children. He is a fan of Liverpool Football Club. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Entertainers from Merseyside Category:People with dyslexia
title: Stephen Graham
